thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location and hospitable staff
thread.title_full: Excellent location and hospitable staff - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: obladee
title: Excellent location and hospitable staff
text:
I really enjoyed my stay here. This is a walk-to everything location, particularly well suited to tourists in Rome. The location on the Pantheon's piazza is simply wonderful. To have that view early in the morning and in the evening left me feeling very fortunate. Was able to pop into the Pantheon when I had a spare moment to marvel at the structure.
We were there in Feb, so I can't speak to the summer crowds, but it was really an oasis and the piazza was quiet in the evening.
Room Tip: Book a view of the Pantheon See more room tips
